ComicInfo.Characters: Parliament of Gears,Swamp Thing [Levi Kamei],Trinity,the Pale Pilgrim,Hedera [Jacob Kamei]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:55:31 [Issue ID 4000-939081] urn:comicvine:4000-939081 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:10:14. [Issue ID 2419899]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Armageddon Part 1: Using Green Lantern's power and his own will power to create a new construct body, Levi joins with Jacob to battle against the Parliament of Gears, while Trinity observes and tries to understand her role in events.
The Endless Line: Neal Adams discusses his viewpoint on using new ideas and exercising his imagination, while many of the characters whom he contributed his talents to line up to thank him.
ComicInfo.Title: Armageddon Part 1; The Endless Line
ComicInfo.Writer: Ram V,Ram V,Tom King,Neal Adams,Cary Bates,Denys Cowan,Mike Gold,Larry Hama,Jenette Kahn,Carl Potts,Roy Thomas,Paul Levitz,Terry Austin,Jon Bogdanove,Bill Sienkiewicz,Jim Lee,Michael Golden,Laura Siegel Larson,Frank Miller
